api:field.api:text: Multi-disciplinary collaboration during ward rounds: Embodied aspects of electronic medical record usage

api:field.name: title
api:field.api:text: Multi-disciplinary collaboration during ward rounds: Embodied aspects of electronic medical record usage

api:field.name: title
api:field.api:text: Multi-disciplinary collaboration during ward rounds: Embodied aspects of electronic medical record usage

api:field.name: abstract
api:field.api:text: Hospital medicine necessitates that practitioners from many disciplines collaborate to care for patients with complex illnesses. Much emphasis is placed on multi-disciplinary interaction during the ward round to achieve collaboration, but it can still be difficult to attain. This paper looks at how electronic medical records affect multi-disciplinary collaboration during ward rounds.
